description:
Russian President Vladimir Putin received a ceremonial welcome at Rashtrapati Bhavan as President Droupadi Murmu greeted her Russian counterpart on Day 2 of his India visit. After the guard of honour, Putin will head to Rajghat to pay tribute to Mahatma Gandhi. The highly anticipated Modi-Putin Summit at Hyderabad House will follow, culminating in a joint press conference. All eyes are on the major defence, trade and strategic announcements expected today.

title: Vladimir Putin In India Updates: PM Modi Announces Free Tourist Visas For Russian Citizens | News18
description:
Russian President Vladimir Putin is in New Delhi for his two-day India visit, where he held summit talks with Prime Minister Narendra Modi in New Delhi, aiming to boost trade with the top buyer of Russia's arms and seaborne oil as Western sanctions squeeze their decades-old ties. The Russian leader is on his first visit to India in four years at a time when New Delhi is engaged in talks with the US for a trade deal to cut punitive tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump on its goods over India's Russian oil purchases.

Moscow has been India's top arms supplier for decades and has said that it wants to import more Indian goods in an effort to grow trade to $100 billion by 2030 that so far has been skewed in its favour due to New Delhi's energy imports.

The deal signals a major shift in Middle East military balance as Moscow and Tehran deepen strategic coordination.

description:

Imran Khan‚Äôs sister Uzma Khanum has confirmed that the former Pakistan Prime Minister is in good health after meeting him inside Adiala Jail. The visit comes amid rising concerns from family members and PTI supporters, who continue protesting to know his condition as he remains imprisoned since August 2023 on corruption charges. With Section 144 enforced in Islamabad and Rawalpindi, tensions remain high as supporters demand transparency and access.

Serious allegations have surfaced regarding Dr. Natesh, a senior doctor associated with Jayadeva Hospital. Several patients claim that they were allegedly misled and pressured into undergoing surgeries at his private clinic, Buddha Global Heart Care. These accusations came to light when one patient sought a second opinion and raised concerns about the recommended treatment.

This video discusses the allegations, patient experiences, and the importance of seeking multiple medical opinions before making critical health decisions. The intention is to raise awareness‚Äînot to target individuals‚Äîbut to encourage transparency, ethical practices, and patient safety.

üí¨ If you or someone you know has faced a similar situation, feel free to share your experience in the comments.

Always seek a second opinion for major medical procedures.
This content is for public awareness and discussion.

Massive looting of Annabhagya rice is taking place in Bellary, made possible by the protection of certain authorities. The smuggling of ration rice has become rampant across the district. This racket is reportedly being carried out under the watch of government officials, and the stolen ration rice is allegedly being taken by Amar Nath Reddy, who claims to be a close associate of the MLA.

Home and Vehicle Loan EMIs Will Decrease! Who Benefits? Who Loses? | #rbi #reservebankofindia #reservebank #reporatecut #reporate #emi #loanemi 

Have you taken a large amount of Home Loan? Are you finding it difficult to pay the monthly EMI? If so, the RBI has given you another piece of good news. The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has announced a significant decision to reduce the burden on your pocket. The Monetary Policy Committee (MPC), led by RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra, has once again cut the Repo Rate by 25 basis points (bps). With this, the rate has been cut a total of four times this year, amounting to a total reduction of 125 basis points. While this will bring relief to borrowers, it is a slightly bitter piece of news for those who live on the interest from Fixed Deposits (FDs) in banks and for investors. We will see what that is. Additionally, what is the reason behind this RBI decision? What will be its effect on the Real Estate sector? What should depositors do now? Let's look at the complete information in detail in this video.

Russian President Vladimir Putin arrived in India for a high-stakes diplomatic visit amid the ongoing Russia-Ukraine conflict. Global attention intensified when Prime Minister Narendra Modi broke protocol to receive him personally ‚Äî and when both leaders chose to travel in a Toyota Fortuner, instead of the usual Range Rover, Mercedes-Maybach, or Putin‚Äôs Aurus Senat.

This unexpected move has triggered massive debate worldwide. Experts call it ‚ÄúFortuner Diplomacy‚Äù, a symbolic message to Western powers who have imposed sanctions on Russia.
From geopolitical strategy to logistic reasons (like seat configuration for interpreters), here‚Äôs the complete analysis of why the Fortuner was chosen.

The visit also featured strong statements by PM Modi on peace, India‚Äôs stance on the Ukraine crisis, and future India‚ÄìRussia cooperation.
Watch the full video to understand the hidden message behind the car, the private dinner, and India‚Äôs high-level diplomacy.

The Karnataka government has exciting news for North Karnataka! The long-pending railway connectivity between Bangalore and Vijayapura is set to get a major boost. Currently, trains on this route take over 15 hours due to engine changes and extended stops. But with new bypass routes and upcoming railway projects, travel time is expected to reduce to just 10 hours.

The much-awaited Vande Bharat Sleeper Train may soon operate on this route, providing modern, comfortable, and faster travel for passengers. Key infrastructure projects like double-line electrification, new bypass tracks, and bridges at strategic locations are underway, with completion expected by 2026.

This video covers:
Route details for the new Vande Bharat Sleeper Train
Travel time reduction strategies via bypass tracks
Ongoing railway infrastructure works in North Karnataka
Projects on Tumakuru‚ÄìRayadurg, Chitradurga‚ÄìDavanagere, and Bangalore‚ÄìMysuru lines
Expected benefits for commerce, tourism, and local commuters
Stay tuned for updates on state-of-the-art railway services in Karnataka, connecting major cities faster and more efficiently!

Copper is Scarce, Price is Rising! What is the Effect on India? | #copper #aitechnologies #gold #indiagold #copperingotsoffinequality 

The modern world runs on electricity and electronics, and the lifeline for both is Copper. Until recently, you and I might have thought copper was limited only to wires and utensils. However, in the mid-2020s, copper has transformed into the world's most crucial and controversial resource. On one hand, there is the explosion of Artificial Intelligence (AI), and on the other, the global race towards Green Energy is accelerating. Additionally, the global competition in weaponry is also increasing. Due to these three reasons, an unprecedented demand for copper has been created. But ironically, copper production is not keeping up with the soaring demand. Mines are depleting day by day. Experts fear this could strike a major blow to global economic growth. So, what is the reason for this sudden copper shortage? What is the connection between AI technology and copper? What problems will this cause for India's solar and power grid projects? Will copper become as expensive as gold?

Goodbye to Old RC, DL, What Does it Look Like? How to Get it? What is the Price? | #karnatakapoliticalanews #dl #drivinglicenceapply #smartcardnews #karnatakatransport 

Do you still have an old, book-like RC (Registration Certificate)? Or are you driving around with a license printed on paper? You no longer need to worry about it getting wet in the rain or tearing in your pocket, because the Karnataka Transport Department has gone high-tech. A new Smart Card system has been implemented across the state starting December 1st. Under the Central Government's ambitious 'One Nation, One Card' scheme, the Vehicle Registration Certificate (RC) and Driving License (DL) in Karnataka will now be available in a smart card format. This card, featuring state-of-the-art machines imported from Italy, QR code scanning, a waterproof body, and several other features, has generated great curiosity. Let's look at the details here, along with how to apply for it. Can those who possess the old RC and DL also obtain this card?

‡≤á‡≤Ç‡≤°‡≤ø‡≤ó‡≥ã ‡≤µ‡≤ø‡≤Æ‡≤æ‡≤®‡≤ó‡≤≥‡≥Å ‡≤¶‡≤ø‡≤¢‡≥Ä‡≤∞‡≥ç‚Äå ‡≤∞‡≤¶‡≥ç‡≤¶‡≤æ‡≤ó‡≤ø‡≤¶‡≥ç‡≤Ø‡≤æ‡≤ï‡≥Ü?, ‡≤Ö‡≤∏‡≤≤‡≤ø ‡≤ï‡≤æ‡≤∞‡≤£ ‡≤∞‡≤ø‡≤µ‡≥Ä‡≤≤‡≥ç‚Äå | Why Were Indigo Flights Suddenly Cancelled? The Real Reason is Revealed | #indigoflight #indigo #indigocabincrew #indoflight 

The Indigo company, which has created the largest empire in India's skies, is currently facing an eclipse. It is going through the most serious operational crisis in the last few years. Yes, would you believe that 65% of Indigo flights did not operate on time on a single day? You have to believe it. Over 200 flights have been cancelled, and hundreds of flights have been delayed by hours. Thousands of passengers were stranded at airports, suffering from hunger and sleeplessness. There are pilots, but they are not allowed to fly; there are planes, but no crew. The reason for all this is one new rule that came into force. So, did that 'new rule' that came into effect on November 1st become a crisis for Indigo? What is this new rule? Why were the flights cancelled? What happened to Indigo Airlines?

Will the 11-Year Mystery Be Revealed? | #malasyia #mh370mystery #mh370 #malesiaairlines #flight 

In 2014, a Malaysia Airlines flight mysteriously disappeared. What happened to the massive Boeing aircraft carrying 239 people, and where it went, is still unknown. Even after searching extensively, not a single clue about the plane's wreckage has been found. However, now, 11 years later, the search for the lost flight, MH370, is restarting. The Malaysian government is once again moving ahead with the search for MH370. From December 30th, the search operation in the South Indian Ocean is set to resume. But this time, humans will not search for the plane; state-of-the-art robotic vessels will sweep the ocean depths. The surprise element in this is that the Malaysian government has stated that payment will only be made if the plane's wreckage is found. They have clearly said that if the plane is not found, no money will be paid. So, what will the search for the lost plane look like after 11 years? Where is the plane presumed to be? What does the pilot suicide theory suggest?

‡≤ó‡≥É‡≤π ‡≤ï‡≤æ‡≤∞‡≥ç‡≤Æ‡≤ø‡≤ï‡≤∞‡≤ø‡≤ó‡≥Ü ‡≤ó‡≥Å‡≤°‡≥ç‚Äå‡≤®‡≥ç‡≤Ø‡≥Ç‡≤∏‡≥ç‚Äå, ‡≤∏‡≤Ç‡≤¨‡≤≥ ‡≤ú‡≥ä‡≤§‡≥Ü‡≤ó‡≥Ü ‡≤™‡≤ø‡≤Ç‡≤ö‡≤£‡≤ø, ‡≤µ‡≤æ‡≤∞‡≤ï‡≥ç‡≤ï‡≥ä‡≤Ç‡≤¶‡≥Å ‡≤∞‡≤ú‡≥Ü, ‡≤è‡≤®‡≤ø‡≤¶‡≥Å ‡≤ï‡≤∞‡≥ç‡≤®‡≤æ‡≤ü‡≤ï ‡≤ó‡≥É‡≤π ‡≤ï‡≤æ‡≤∞‡≥ç‡≤Æ‡≤ø‡≤ï‡≤∞ ‡≤Æ‡≤∏‡≥Ç‡≤¶‡≥Ü?  | Good News for Domestic Workers, Pension Along with Salary, One Day Off Per Week, What is this Karnataka Domestic Workers Bill? | #pensionschemes #karnatakagovernment #karnatakacongressgovernment #domesticworkers #domesticworkersbill #domesticworker 

A revolutionary change is currently taking place in Karnataka. For the first time in the country, the Karnataka government is preparing to enact a historic bill that could change the lives of domestic workers: the 'Karnataka Domestic Workers (Social Security and Welfare) Bill, 2025'. So, what is this bill? What are the benefits for domestic workers? What are the new rules for homeowners? The Karnataka government has prepared the 2025 draft bill to protect the rights of domestic workers and provide them with social security. The government has made all preparations to table this bill in the upcoming winter session in Belagavi. The notification for this was released on October 15, and it applies to all homes within the limits of Mahanagara Palikes (City Corporations) and Municipalities in the state. This means that all those who come for domestic work in cities, including those hired through agencies, will come under this law. This is not just a law on paper; it is a promise to provide a 'life of dignity' to domestic workers.

If you ask what is happening in the Congress camp right now, the answer is just one: 'Unquenched Embers Within Congress'. Yes, on the surface, everything appears calm, the leaders are united, and the government is stable‚Äîthis is what the Congress leaders are trying to project. However, a different story is unfolding inside the house. Looking at the two breakfast meetings that took place just recently, some might have thought, "Wow, Siddaramaiah and DK Shivakumar have united, the battle is over," but the Chief Minister's chair volcano is still not extinguished. Was the conversation that took place over idli-vada sambar limited only to the camera's eyes? Because the high drama that took place in Mangaluru tells a different truth. What is the secret behind the slogans that erupted right in front of AICC leader Venugopal? Is this quietly smoldering volcano ready to explode? What exactly is happening between Siddaramaiah and DKS in Congress right now?

The failure to replace the damaged 19th crest gate and the weakened 32 gates has raised major safety concerns.

What is this RELOS Agreement? China, Pakistan Tremble! | #vladimirputin #donaldtrump #india #pmnarendramodiji #indiarussiadeal #indiarussiadeal 

The long-standing friendship between India and Russia has now gained the strength of an elephant. Even before Russian President Vladimir Putin's visit to India, a significant development occurred in the defense sector. The Russian Parliament has approved the mutual logistics support deal, or RELOS Agreement, with India. Russia approved this agreement on Tuesday, which will take the defense relationship between the two countries to the next level. According to this deal, Indian and Russian military forces can now use each other's military bases for fuel, repair, and rest. This is not merely a matter of military logistics; it is a golden opportunity for the Indian Navy to expand its reach in the Arctic region. So, what is this RELOS Agreement? What are the benefits for India? How will it affect China? What are the advantages for Russia? Here is the complete information on all of this.

‡≤®‡≥å‡≤ï‡≤™‡≤°‡≥Ü‡≤ó‡≥Ü ‡≤π‡≥ä‡≤∏ ‡≤¨‡≥ç‡≤∞‡≤π‡≥ç‡≤Æ‡≤æ‡≤∏‡≥ç‡≤§‡≥ç‡≤∞; ‡≤π‡≥à‡≤™‡≤µ‡≤∞‡≥ç‚Äå ‡≤™‡≤∞‡≤Æ‡≤æ‡≤£‡≥Å ‡≤∏‡≤ú‡≥ç‡≤ú‡≤ø‡≤§ ‡≤∏‡≤¨‡≥ç‚Äå‡≤Æ‡≤∞‡≤ø‡≤®‡≥ç‚Äå ‡≤Ö‡≤∞‡≤ø‡≤¶‡≤Æ‡≤® ‡≤é‡≤Ç‡≤ü‡≥ç‡≤∞‡≤ø‡≤ó‡≥Ü ‡≤¶‡≤ø‡≤®‡≤ó‡≤£‡≤®‡≥Ü; ‡≤è‡≤®‡≤ø‡≤¶‡≤∞ ‡≤∏‡≤æ‡≤Æ‡≤∞‡≥ç‡≤•‡≥ç‡≤Ø?  | New Brahmasthra for the Navy; Countdown Begins for the Entry of High-Power Nuclear-Equipped Submarine Aridhaman; What is its Capability? | #submarine #indianairforce #insaridhaman #indiannavyvideo #navy 

India's grip on the Indian Ocean is now unshakeable. Whether it's the Dragon China or the cunning Pakistan, they will have to think a hundred times before provoking India. This is because a powerful 'Water Demon' capable of hiding in the depths of the sea and launching nuclear bombs at enemy camps is ready to join the Indian Navy. Yes, that is INS Aridhaman. The countdown has begun for the arrival of the Aridhaman, born to suppress the enemies, and its arrival will give the Navy the strength of a thousand elephants. Fear has begun in the hearts of enemies over the power of India's submarines. So, what is its strength? Why is it essential for India? We will explore the specialties of the vessel and how it will empower India.

Do you need to draft a house rental agreement? Or do you need to register property? From now on, you don't have to wander to shops looking for stamp paper, nor do you need to pay money to brokers or middlemen and wait. Yes, viewers, the Karnataka State Government has brought about a major revolution in the Revenue Department. The "Digital E-Stamp" system has been made mandatory across the state. Blunder While Trying to Pose as a Helper! | #pakistan #indiapakistannewslatest #indiapakistanclash #shrilanka #shrilankaindia 

India had provided massive aid to cyclone-affected Sri Lanka through Operation Sagar Bandhu. Following this, Pakistan also stepped forward to assist the island nation. However, in its haste to help Sri Lanka, Pakistan made a blunder. Pakistan, which tried to show solidarity with the distressed island nation, sent relief materials that have now caused them embarrassment. Photographs shared by Pakistan's High Commission in Colombo itself show that the relief packages had an expiry date of 10/2024 printed on them. This led to intense outrage and was a major public humiliation for Pakistan, which had sent expired aid after making false accusations against India. While Pakistan is being trolled on one side, India has rushed to help flood-affected Sri Lanka on a large scale. What is the large-scale rescue operation being carried out by the Indian Army through Operation Sagar Bandhu? What was Pakistan's blunder? What was the accusation Pakistan leveled against India? Let's look at the details in this video.

‡≤π‡≥ä‡≤∏ ‡≤´‡≥ã‡≤®‡≥ç‚Äå‡≤®‡≤≤‡≥ç‡≤≤‡≤ø '‡≤∏‡≤Ç‡≤ö‡≤æ‡≤∞‡≥ç ‡≤∏‡≤æ‡≤•‡≤ø' ‡≤ï‡≤°‡≥ç‡≤°‡≤æ‡≤Ø: ‡≤∞‡≤ï‡≥ç‡≤∑‡≤£‡≥Ü‡≤ó‡≥ã ‡≤Ö‡≤•‡≤µ‡≤æ ‡≤ï‡≤£‡≥ç‡≤ó‡≤æ‡≤µ‡≤≤‡≤ø‡≤ó‡≥ã? ‡≤µ‡≤ø‡≤∞‡≥ã‡≤ß ‡≤™‡≤ï‡≥ç‡≤∑‡≤ó‡≤≥ ‡≤ï‡≥Ü‡≤Ç‡≤°! ‡≤è‡≤®‡≤ø‡≤¶‡≥Å ‡≤∏‡≤∞‡≥ç‡≤ï‡≤æ‡≤∞‡≤¶ ‡≤π‡≥ä‡≤∏ '‡≤¨‡≤ø‡≤ó‡≥ç ‡≤¨‡≥ç‡≤∞‡≤¶‡≤∞‡≥ç' ‡≤∞‡≥Ç‡≤≤‡≥ç? | 'Sanchar Saathi' Mandatory in New Phones: For Protection or Surveillance? Opposition Parties Fume! What is this Government's New 'Big Brother' Rule? | #sanchaarisathi #karnatakagovernment #newphones #newrules2025 #karnataka 

India has over 600 million smartphone users, and this number is increasing daily. Along with this, cases of cyber fraud and phone theft are also on the rise. To curb this, the Central Government has taken a big step, but it has now become controversial, with serious allegations that the government is attempting to spy on citizens' privacy. The central point of this controversy is the Sanchar Saathi app. The Central Government has issued a significant directive to mobile phone manufacturers, mandating that the Sanchar Saathi app must be pre-installed on every smartphone manufactured or imported into India. This rule applies to all smartphone companies, including Apple, Samsung, and Xiaomi, and a 90-day deadline has been given for its implementation. However, the government's move has caused massive controversy, with accusations that it amounts to spying on people's privacy. So, what is this Sanchar Saathi? What are the benefits of this app for the public? And why are opposition parties and experts expressing concern about it?

What is it? What is the Difference Between This and a Normal Wedding? | #samntha #rajnidimoru #celebrityweddings #celebrityweddingpics 

The famous actress Samantha Ruth Prabhu has stepped into a new chapter of her life. Samantha tied the knot with filmmaker Raj Nidimoru, famous for The Family Man web series. However, their marriage did not take place in some luxurious hotel or as a destination wedding. Instead, it was conducted in an extremely simple, spiritual, and divine atmosphere. The couple entered wedded life on Monday, December 1st, at the Linga Bhairavi Temple in the Isha Yoga Center in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. The specialty is that they did not have a traditional wedding, but a Bhuta Shuddhi Wedding according to the Yoga tradition. So, what is this Bhuta Shuddhi Wedding? What is the importance of this marriage? Who can get married in this manner? Let's look at the complete information on this in this video.

Modi Government's New Plan! Why This Measure? | #cigarette #cigrate #pmnarendramodiji #modigovtnews #newbill 

The Modi government has delivered another big shock to lovers of tobacco, cigarettes, and pan masala. The new shock is such that if you light a cigarette, your pocket will catch fire. The Central Government is moving to bring significant changes to the tax system on 'Sin Goods' or harmful substances. The GST compensation cess on tobacco, cigarette, and pan masala products is expiring. At this juncture, Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman presented two crucial bills in the Lok Sabha on Monday. To replace the existing compensation cess and maintain revenue, the Central Excise Amendment Bill, 2025, and the Health Security and National Security Cess Bill, 2025, have been introduced. From now on, a cess will also be levied on pan masala manufacturing machinery, and a strict warning of harsh punishment has been given to curb tax evasion. So, what do the new bills contain? What will happen to the prices of cigarette and tobacco products? Where will the collected revenue go?

Mallya, Nirav, Including 15 Fugitives! Interest is Double the Principal! | #centralgovernment #indianbank #neeravmodi #vijaymalya #centralgovernmentnews 

An array of the biggest frauds in India's banking history has been exposed. Not just Vijay Mallya and Nirav Modi, but 15 fugitive economic offenders have cheated the country's banks. The Central Government provided explosive information in the Lok Sabha regarding the individuals who borrowed loans from the country's prestigious banks, defaulted on repayment, and fled abroad. The total loss incurred by various Indian banks from the 15 fraudsters, including Mallya and Nirav, is a staggering amount exceeding ‚Çπ57,000 crores. Minister of State for Finance, Pankaj Chaudhary, officially stated that this massive loss, including principal and interest, occurred based on calculations up to October 31. So, who are these 15 individuals? How much loss was incurred by the banks from Vijay Mallya and Nirav Modi? How much money has the government recovered from them? How did the interest double the principal amount?

Government App Must Be Present in New Phones! | #watsapp #telegram #telecoms #indiatelecom #governmentapp 

Significant changes are happening in India's telecom and smartphone sectors. In particular, the Central Government has delivered a big shock to smartphone companies and WhatsApp users. From now on, if you remove your SIM card from your phone, apps like WhatsApp, Telegram, or Signal will not work. The Central Government has given a 90-day deadline for messaging platforms to adopt SIM binding technology. Furthermore, a strict rule is being implemented that mandates the installation of one of the government's cybersecurity apps on every new smartphone entering the market, and no one should be allowed to delete it. These rules, set to be enforced from February 2026, will change the mobile world. However, there are also some concerns regarding people's privacy. So, what is this SIM binding? Will WhatsApp Web exist from now on, or not? Which app will the government install? Why has the Apple company rebelled against the government?

‡≤§‡≤Æ‡≤ø‡≤≥‡≥Å‡≤®‡≤æ‡≤°‡≤ø‡≤®‡≤ø‡≤Ç‡≤¶ ‡≤¨‡≤ø‡≤π‡≤æ‡≤∞‡≤ï‡≥ç‡≤ï‡≥Ü ‡≤π‡≥ä‡≤∞‡≤ü ‡≤µ‡≤ø‡≤∂‡≥ç‡≤µ‡≤¶ ‡≤Ö‡≤§‡≤ø‡≤¶‡≥ä‡≤°‡≥ç‡≤° ‡≤∂‡≤ø‡≤µ‡≤≤‡≤ø‡≤Ç‡≤ó; 2 ‡≤≤‡≤ï‡≥ç‡≤∑ ‡≤ï‡≥Ü‡≤ú‡≤ø ‡≤§‡≥Ç‡≤ï, 33 ‡≤Ö‡≤°‡≤ø ‡≤é‡≤§‡≥ç‡≤§‡≤∞ | The World's Largest Shivling Heading from Tamil Nadu to Bihar; 2 Lakh Kg Weight, 33 Feet Height | #shivalingam #shivalinga #tamilnadu #tamilnadunewsupdates #biharpolitics #biharnews 

This is a spectacular, unprecedented moment in the history of India. You may have seen many temples and colossal statues until now. But the news we are about to tell you is beyond your imagination. A great pilgrimage has begun from the historical town of Mahabalipuram in Tamil Nadu to Champaran in Bihar. This is not an ordinary journey; it is a divine voyage. Would you believe it if we told you that a Shivling carved from a single stone, weighing a staggering 2 lakh kgs and standing 33 feet tall, has hit the road? Yes, this is the confluence of modern engineering and Sanatana sculpture. Everyone is watching in amazement how this largest Shivling in the world is being transported all the way there. So, what is this Mahashivayatre (Great Shiva Journey) of the Mahalingam? Why is it being taken from Tamil Nadu to Bihar? Who built it? What is the story behind it?

Supreme Court Refuses to Extend Deadline for Uploading Property Details on UMED! | #waqfboard #waqfbill #centralgovernment #supremecourt #waqfproperties 

The Central Government has secured a major victory in the Supreme Court regarding the Waqf Act. The apex court clearly refused to extend the deadline for the registration of Waqf properties under the new rule. December 6th is the final day to upload the details of Waqf properties on the UMED portal. The Supreme Court disappointed the petitioners who had requested an extension of the deadline citing technical glitches and other reasons. The Court instructed that if it is not possible to upload the property information on the portal, they should directly approach the Waqf Tribunal. Furthermore, any properties not uploaded on the UMED portal by December 6th are likely to be considered disputed. So, what did the Supreme Court say regarding the upload of Waqf property details? What was the argument presented by senior advocate Kapil Sibal? What are the legal consequences of not registering? Let's look at the complete information on this matter in this video.

Was Russia's Discount Offer Rejected? | #russia #operationgayana #indiaustrade #oiltransport 

India, which surprised the world by purchasing oil from Russia at discounted rates after the Ukraine war, has now taken another unexpected decision. The heat from America's strict sanctions and duties on Russian oil is increasing day by day. Against this backdrop, Indian refineries have found an alternative route. For the first time, India has turned to Guyana in South America, a distance of about 11,000 miles or 17,700 kilometers. Already, two huge super tankers from Guyana are headed for India. This adventurous step taken by Indian oil companies to reduce dependence on Russia and escape American sanctions is now making waves globally. So, what is this Operation Guyana? Why is India moving away from Russia to import oil from such a distant country? What is the role of American President Donald Trump behind this move? Let's look at the complete details in this video.

A crucial compromise meeting between Karnataka CM Siddaramaiah and Deputy CM DK Shivakumar has sparked political discussions across the state. Despite a temporary pause in the power tussle, talks suggest the truce may only be short-lived. Ahead of the Belagavi Winter Session, both leaders are holding strategic breakfast meetings to maintain stability.

Bengaluru and several districts are expected to receive rainfall for the next 5 days, according to meteorological reports. Cold weather conditions are likely to continue.
Additionally, the Indian Parliament‚Äôs Winter Session begins today with key bills lined up for discussion.

India has taken a historic leap in military technology!
A Karnataka-based deep-tech startup, Neuralix AI, has developed the nation‚Äôs first fully indigenous Defence AI-as-a-Service ‚Äî launched by Defence Minister Rajnath Singh at the prestigious Chanakya Defence Dialogue.

This groundbreaking AI platform, powered by a secure Military-Grade LLM (Large Language Model), is built exclusively for the Indian Army. It enhances battlefield decision-making, intelligence analysis, multilingual communication, data privacy, and mission readiness ‚Äî without relying on foreign cloud systems.

From command support to secure data operations, this AI could redefine the future of warfare and strengthen the vision of Atmanirbhar Bharat.
Watch the full breakdown of how Karnataka‚Äôs innovators have gifted a ‚ÄúDigital Brahmastra‚Äù to the Indian Army.

‡≤ï‡≤∞‡≥ç‡≤®‡≤æ‡≤ü‡≤ï‡≤¶‡≤≤‡≥ç‡≤≤‡≤ø ‡≤°‡≤ø‡≤ü‡≥ç‡≤µ‡≤æ ‡≤∏‡≥à‡≤ï‡≥ç‡≤≤‡≥ã‡≤®‡≥ç‚Äå ‡≤é‡≤´‡≥Ü‡≤ï‡≥ç‡≤ü‡≥ç;‚Äå ‡≤π‡≤≤‡≤µ‡≥Å ‡≤ú‡≤ø‡≤≤‡≥ç‡≤≤‡≥Ü‡≤ó‡≤≥‡≤≤‡≥ç‡≤≤‡≤ø ‡≤Æ‡≤≥‡≥Ü ‡≤∏‡≤æ‡≤ß‡≥ç‡≤Ø‡≤§‡≥Ü; ‡≤Ø‡≥Ü‡≤≤‡≥ç‡≤≤‡≥ã ‡≤Ö‡≤≤‡≤∞‡≥ç‡≤ü‡≥ç‚Äå ‡≤ò‡≥ã‡≤∑‡≤£‡≥Ü; ‡≤é‡≤≤‡≥ç‡≤≤‡≥Ü‡≤≤‡≥ç‡≤≤‡≤ø ‡≤Æ‡≤≥‡≥Ü?  | Ditwah Cyclone Effect in Karnataka; Possibility of Rain in Several Districts; Yellow Alert Declared; Where Will it Rain? | #cycloneditwah #cyclone #cyclonealert #cycloneyaasliveupdates 

The state is currently experiencing strange weather. Waking up in the morning, the cold is so severe that it's difficult to leave the bed. Just as one waits for the sun to appear, suddenly the clouds gather, and by evening, a bone-chilling cold breeze sets in. Yes, the people of Karnataka are now facing two simultaneous troubles: on one side, teeth-chattering cold, and on the other, untimely rain that can pour down at any moment. The cause of all this is one cyclone: the 'Ditwah' Cyclone. The wave of this cyclone, blowing from the Sri Lankan side, is now shaking South India. While Tamil Nadu is already on high alert, the South Interior of Karnataka is under a 'Yellow Alert'. So, what is the actual impact of this cyclone? Will it rain in Bengaluru? How many more days will the cold last? Why have flights been canceled in Chennai? In which districts of Karnataka will it rain?

An explosive piece of news has emerged that is set to create turmoil in the country's politics and cause tremors in the Congress camp. Yes, the National Herald Case, which had been dormant all this while, has exploded again. However, this time it is not limited merely to questioning; instead, it has transformed into a direct Criminal Case. The Economic Offenses Wing (EOW) of the Delhi Police has filed a new FIR against Congress leaders Sonia Gandhi and Rahul Gandhi. This comes seven months after the ED (Enforcement Directorate) filed a chargesheet against them. With the filing of the FIR now, the legal noose around the Gandhi family has tightened further. So, what is this National Herald Case? What does the FIR contain? What kind of trouble will Rahul Gandhi and Sonia Gandhi face? Let's look at the complete details.

title: Former Minister Roshan Baig: "Community Is Being Looted in the Name of Madrasas" #madrasaeducation
description:
Former minister Roshan Baig criticized the current state of many madrasas, saying they have turned into commercial setups exploiting the community in the name of education. He pointed out issues such as lack of proper space, no physical activities, and students not being encouraged to read newspapers. Baig stressed that the time has come for meaningful and serious madrasa reforms. He made these remarks while speaking at the grand celebrations of the 33rd Foundation Day of the All India Milli Council in Bengaluru.
